org.apache.ignite.cache.query

Interface FieldsQueryCursor<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Iterable<T>, QueryCursor<T>

    public interface FieldsQueryCursor<T>
extends QueryCursor<T>
    SQL query result cursor. This extends QueryCursor to expose fields metadata to public API for SqlFieldsQueries.
